title: OLD ACCOUNT GOT HACKED NO RESPONCE FOR 2 MONTHS ARE U SRS
body: 2 month ago my account got hacked ( airbestcoc) and guess what it was from a scammer link that i clicked  (stupid yes) so the next day while i was playing some other games on my computer  i heard a boop sound etc on my email and bam i see the gmail stuff that ur league account changed etc etc i was like wtf? and so i tried to login  inot lol and iI coudnt i was scared this person also might have got into my email ( later realised he obvs did) so i restarted to default my computer got a norton 360  etc etc changed my email  pass but my league of legend account never got it back :( so i sent a suppourt ticket with all the proivded information guess what no reply for 2 month well i started a new ticket yesterday with the same information heres the ticket number: (#18262003) hope to god this gets fixed faster

replies.body: Ty so much i got my account back :) I dont know if i can say the name of the supppourt perosn in riot but ty so much :) Edit: have to wait for him to reply back to unssuspend my account :) hopefully not to long .
